duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide great customer service by taking orders, assembling orders, delivering food to customers, and cleaning the dining room.
Thrive in an upbeat and fast-paced environment by working all shifts: opening shifts, closing shifts, and everything in between.
Offer entry-level position with paid training for every new Customer Service Associate on the team.
Earn pay increases through additional training, certifications, and performance evaluations within the first year of working in the Restaurant.

Demonstrate qualities of an awesome Canes Customer Service Associate: Team player, Excellent communicator, Happy, Courteous, Enthusiastic, Hard working, Responsible, Dependable, Authentic, Genuine, and Takes pride in doing a good job.
Clean tables, floors, and other areas of the Restaurant, take orders from Customers, process payments efficiently, and follow proper safety procedures when handling and/or preparing food.
Show up to scheduled shifts on time and work together as a team, assisting other Crewmembers in completion of tasks and assignments to ensure continuity of service.
Align with Raising Cane’s culture by balancing Working Hard and Having Fun, take initiative, and comply with Company policies.

education_certification.credential: No formal education requirements, entry-level position
